abstract: New York State authorities order nonprofit insurance cooperative Health Republic to dissolve its business after open policies expire and nonprofit ceases writing new policies, citing likelihood that cooperative will become financially insolvent.
lead_paragraph: State authorities said on Friday that the cooperative, a nonprofit insurer, must stop writing new policies, citing the likelihood that it would become insolvent.

headline.main: New York State Orders Health Republic Co-op to End New Business
headline.print_headline: Insurer Given Order to End New Business

snippet: State authorities said on Friday that the cooperative, a nonprofit insurer, must stop writing new policies, citing the likelihood that it would become insolvent.

keywords.value: Health Republic Insurance of New York
keywords.name: organizations
